description: To convert 11-13 Wolstenholme Square to 2 no. ground floor restaurants (Use Class A3) with 15 no. apartments (C3 Use) on upper floors, including the infilling of the pedestrian underpass, and redevelop Tunnage Square with a four/five storey building fronting Duke Street, comprising 2 no. ground floor retail units (Use Class A1) and 7 no. serviced apartments (Use Class C1) on upper floors.  (Alternative to planning approval (14F/1717).
site_address: 11-13 Wolstenholme Square & Tunnage Square and 67-73 Duke Street, Liverpool, L1 4JJ
